function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient targeted operations for identifying and managing asymptomatic and symptomatic infections","Impact":"Increased risk of continued transmission and resurgence of malaria","Mitigation":"Implement targeted operations to identify and cure both asymptomatic and symptomatic infections, and manage importation risk","Technologies":"Malaria risk mapping technology, rapid diagnostic tests","People":"Population in malaria-endemic areas","Owner":"Health authorities, malaria elimination programmes"},{"Description":"Inaccurate and untimely creation of risk maps for elimination programmes","Impact":"Failure to understand the epidemiology of malaria in disappearing disease areas, leading to inadequate deployment of control measures","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate and timely creation of risk maps to understand the epidemiology of disappearing disease areas and deploy control measures effectively","Technologies":"Geospatial technology, GIS mapping tools","People":"Malaria elimination programmes, public health officials","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of capacity to rapidly provide diagnostically confirmed malaria incidence in very low transmission environments","Impact":"Inability to measure malaria at very low levels of endemicity, hindering elimination efforts","Mitigation":"Build capacity to rapidly provide diagnostically confirmed malaria incidence, including the place of residence of cases","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic tests, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Population in areas with very low levels of malaria transmission","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"}]}
